Name: Doctor No. 3
Ingredients: 3 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Tangy Swedish Punch freshened with orange and lemon juice.
History: In his 1948 The Fine Art of Mixing Drinks , David A. Embury lists a Doctor No. 3 comprising "One part lemon juice, 1 part orange juice, 2 parts Swedish Punch."
Nutrition: One serving of Doctor No. 3 contains 118 calories
